= Lesson 3 details =

== Preparation ==

  * Install Java (if you don't have it installed) from [http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/index.html the Java download site]
  * Install Eclipse Indigo from [http://www.eclipse.org/downloads/packages/eclipse-ide-java-developers/indigosr2]
  * In Eclipse, install Scala-IDE from update site at [http://download.scala-ide.org/sdk/e37/scala29/stable/site/]

		println(-c) // -3-7i
